scenario_text.value: This is really starting to feel epic...

Yeah, this place definitely has its own feel
to it. It’s kind of scary.

Hey, don’t say that! You want to get the rest
of us scared too?
Do you really think it’s that bad?

Just look at the walls! Now I can’t help but
see human faces in those patterns!

Eek! You idiot! Why would you even say that?
Now I’m even more scared!

Let’s try to focus on what’s in front of us
and keep moving, or we’ll make things worse.

Good thinking. Let’s try not to pay too much
attention to the walls.
Hm? Hey guys, check this out.
Didn’t we just say not to look at the walls?!
Yeah, I know, but...look at this.
It’s creepy, is what it is.

(It really is a creepy engraving. It shows
children being dropped from high up...)

(...only to be eaten by something waiting for
them on the ground.)
It’s like a scene from Hell.
